data.trans_hint: Đi dọc theo con đường này rồi rẽ trái.
data.en_hint: Go along this road then turn left.
data.content_game_1: go along this road then turn left.
data.answer_en_hint: go along this road then turn left.

data.trans: Ngưng phát sóng (TV, đài phát thanh), đóng cửa (công ty, nhà máy,...)
data.trans_hint: Hầu hết mọi nhà máy ở khu vực này đều bị đóng cửa vào những năm 1990.
data.en_hint: Almost every factories in this area were closed down in the 1990s.
data.content_game_1: Almost every factories in this area were closed down in the 1990s.
data.answer_en_hint: Almost every factories in this area were closed down in the 1990s.

data.trans: Góp tiền (để trả cho cái gì)
data.trans_hint: Họ góp tiền để mua cho anh ấy một món quà.
data.en_hint: They clubbed together to buy him a gift.
data.content_game_1: They clubbed together to buy him a gift.
data.answer_en_hint: They clubbed together to buy him a gift.

data.trans: Tình cờ gặp, bắt gặp, tình cờ thấy
data.trans_hint: Có lẽ tôi sẽ tình cờ gặp anh ấy ở Pháp.
data.en_hint: Perhaps I shall come across him in France.
data.content_game_1: Perhaps I shall come across him in France.
data.answer_en_hint: Perhaps I shall come across him in France.

data.trans: Thoát khỏi, loại bỏ cái gì
data.trans_hint: Người chủ phải bỏ chiếc xe vì một vài vấn đề về tài chính.
data.en_hint: The owner needs to get rid of the car for financial reasons.
data.content_game_1: The owner needs to get rid of the car for financial reasons.
data.answer_en_hint: The owner needs to get rid of the car for financial reasons.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đang săn mua một chiếc TV xịn cho bà tôi ở cửa hàng này.
data.en_hint: I am after a TV of high quality for my grandmother from this shop.
data.content_game_1: I am after a TV of high quality for my grandmother from this shop.
data.answer_en_hint: I am after a TV of high quality for my grandmother from this shop.

data.trans: Mua được thứ gì mình muốn
data.trans_hint: Cuối cùng tôi đã mua được chiếc bàn mình muốn với mức giá hợp lý.
data.en_hint: I finally got hold of this table with a reasonable price.
data.content_game_1: I finally got hold of this table with a reasonable price.
data.answer_en_hint: I finally got hold of this table with a reasonable price.

data.trans_hint: Shop của chúng tôi có khuyến mại giảm giá 50% cho các khách hàng quen nhân dịp này.
data.en_hint: Our shop offers a promotion that knocks 50% off for patrons on this occasion.
data.content_game_1: Our shop offers a promotion that knocks 50% off for patrons on this occasion.
data.answer_en_hint: Our shop offers a promotion that knocks 50% off for patrons on this occasion.

data.trans_hint: Biết là mấy món quần áo này luôn mắc tiền, nhưng tôi vẫn luôn muốn mua được một món.
data.en_hint: I know those clothing items don't come cheap, but I always want to have one.
data.content_game_1: I know those clothing items don't come cheap, but I always want to have one.
data.answer_en_hint: I know those clothing items don't come cheap, but I always want to have one.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy vui sướng vô cùng khi tậu được chiếc váy mình vẫn ao ước với mức giá phải chăng.
data.en_hint: She was over the moon when she got the dress she had always wanted with a reasonable price.
data.content_game_1: She was over the moon when she got the dress she had always wanted with a reasonable price.
data.answer_en_hint: She was over the moon when she got the dress she had always wanted with a reasonable price.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi định thanh lý hết đống quần áo này trước khi đóng shop.
data.en_hint: We intend to sell those clothes off before closing the shop.
data.content_game_1: We intend to sell those clothes off before closing the shop.
data.answer_en_hint: We intend to sell those clothes off before closing the shop.
